caption:
An icon for the years to come 🛋️

When designing this sofa for the STOCKHOLM collection, designer Ola Wihlborg wanted to create one that would hold its shape after you stand up from sitting in it.

After experimenting with over 30 prototypes, Ola finally found the perfect shape that would work with supportive pocket springs and high-resilience foam that can hold its shape and comfort over time.

Tap the link in bio to explore this collection. Available from 10 April onwards, please check with your local IKEA for more details.

#STOCKHOLM2025
